title: Manage a Campus Hiring Event
description: A university recruiting team is managing a career fair, including registering candidates and tracking applications.

tasks.description: Set up a landing page for students to pre-register for the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter creates an event registration page.

tasks.description: At the event, use a tablet to have students sign in and upload their resumes directly into the ATS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiters at the event successfully capture candidate information.

tasks.description: After the event, review all collected resumes and tag them with the 'Career Fair' source code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiting team processes all leads from the event, ensuring they are correctly tracked.
